name: Spooky Dreams
description:
Spooky Dreams

We are Morpheus, guardian of dreams. Eveytime that someone is being attacked through nighmares and it becames a huge danger for them, my mission starts. 

At this time, a little sleepy girl has had spooky dreams. A lot of nightmare foes are attacking her and we need to keep them away.

Every time that the dream rythm hit we will be able to move or attack a nightmare foe. Hit the dream capsules in the right time to make you action. 

Keep the nightmare foes away of the sleepy girl and protect her until dawn.

Good luck to us!

Controls

Use the left mouse click in the right time of the rythm to move and attack foes. 

Credits

Code: Marx Eckert Brasil

Music: João Alves

Art: Francesco Lemos

Game made for BenBonk Game Jam #4
